I would cry and hide in the closet and he would settle down... my older brother wasn‚Äôt always so lucky.  I mostly feared for my mother but she tried to hold everything together... she‚Äôs Catholic and didn‚Äôt believe in divorce; so it was give up your faith and leave or stay and take it.  Women stay and deal for MANY reasons and people keep their mouths shut for many other reasons.  In Johnny, I can see a vicious mean streak that rears it‚Äôs head when he‚Äôs black-out drunk... maybe he doesn‚Äôt even realize it but that‚Äôs no excuse.  I‚Äôve never been this certain.
